thought: The question asks about the procedure to follow when the person authorized to strike out does not do so, in order to ensure the document is valid according to the Revenue Code. The answer provided clearly states that the holder of the document or the beneficiary can strike it out instead. This is a direct response to the question without any unnecessary elaboration, making it straightforward to extract the answer.
answer: ผู้ทรงตราสารหรือผู้ถือเอาประโยชน์ขีดฆ่าแทนได้
